Alex Bernstein's Blog

About

Hi! I’m Alex and i’m currently a graduate student in Probability and Applied Statistics at the University of California, Santa Barbara. I did my Undergrad in Economics and Mathematics and did a Masters in Applied Mathematics at Washington University in St. Louis where I also worked with Zachary Feinstein on Systemic Risk in Financial Networks. I have also previously worked at Epic Systems in the Technical Services role.

Aside from my academic/career life, I am also an avid rock climber and skier.

By Alex Bernstein
